text: Spellbound is a 1945 American romantic psychological thriller movie directed by Alfred Hitchcock and based on the 1927 novel The House of Dr. Edwardes by Hilary Saint George Saunders and John Palmer. It stars Ingrid Bergman, Gregory Peck, Michael Chekhov, Leo G. Carroll, Rhonda Fleming, Norman Lloyd and was distributed by United Artists. It was nominated for 6 Oscars and won an Academy Award in 1946. ==Other websites== * * Category:1945 romance movies Category:1940s psychological movies Category:1940s thriller movies Category:American romance movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Alfred Hitchcock
title: Spellbound (1945 movie)
